name: Zombie Season
description:
Can you save Pine City from Zombie Season? Get fresh, get locked and loaded and exterminate those zombie hordes.

Choose your favourite weapon, sharpen your skills in the shooting range, and get ready to flush out those darned zombies.

Climb, zip-line, and shoot your way to success.

Roadmap


This next week:
Complete level 2
Add 2 weapons - revolver and (open to requests)
Start development of Level 3

Long Term:
Steam Cloud Saves
5 Levels total
10+ guns total
40+ props total
10 enemy types
Greater enemy variation
More scattered usable items
